categoryContent.paragraphOne: Pay attention to the smell of your home when you come back from a trip.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: That's what it smells like to guests all the time, you just get used to it.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: When you have a 3-day long weekend, do all of your chores (laundry, cleaning, homework, etc.) the night before the weekend begins.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: You may have to stay up late that night but you'll thank yourself later when you have 3 full days to relax.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: If you are moving into a new leased house, take a picture of every wall, closet, cupboard and furniture.
If you have a guest bedroom in your home, spend a night in it yourself to be sure there are no annoyances and that it is comfortable.
When moving, pack a “first day” box with everything you think you’ll need right after you arrive.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: It’s annoying to dig through all your boxes for things like modems and hair dryers when you’re tired from your move.
